chinese: 几零；无
答案是零—没有，不存在。
混合，结合，联合
把黄色和蓝色混合起来，你就会得到绿色。
english: Combine yellow and blue, and you will get green

chinese: v.演示，展示；（用实例、实验）论证；示范w示威
推销员在演示怎么操作切瓜神器。
english: The salesman demonstrates how the device works on a watermelon

chinese: n储备；保留；保护区 因保留，预订；
他在家里有一个存放食物的紧急储备库。
english: He has an emergency reserve of food stored at home

chinese: n. 蚊子
她的手臂上有两只蚊子！
english: There are two mosquitos on her arm

chinese: cdv. 持续地，稳步地；有规则地
这个员工的销售业绩在持续增长。
english: The sales performance of the employee grows steadily

chinese: n.交流；性交
这两个男人在此次交谈中想出了一个好点子。
english: The two men came up with a good idea during this intercourse

chinese: ad，总统的，首长的
拉什莫尔山和白宫都会让我们联想到总统制。
english: Mount Rushmore and the White House both remind us of presidential governments

chinese: vt 暴露；揭露
瑙上的水泥掉下来后，砖块露了出来。
english: Some cement fell from the wall, leaving the bricks exposed

chinese: n.笑牌、助章
这些金牌是荣誉的象征。
english: These gold medals are symbols of honor

chinese: ns预测，预言
经理向他的团队展示了他对今年情况的预测。
english: The manager showed his predictions for the year to his team

chinese: Y. 辐射，发出（光或热）
太阳向地球发出光和热。
english: The sun radiates light and heat towards the earth

chinese: 几.帮助；援助；补助
在朋友的帮助下，我爬上了山。
english: I climbed up the hill with the assistance of my friend

chinese: n.水銀、汞
温度计摔碎了，里面的水银流了出来。
english: The thermometer smashed and the mercury flew out

chinese: 几垄断；垄断商品；专卖商品
最大的那家公司垄断了市场！
english: The biggest company has a monopoly in the market
